description:
WordPress is one of the most powerful content management systems (CMS) available. It's versatile, meaning you can use it to create anything from a simple blog to a very complex website. Learning how to use it from the ground up can be a daunting task, but I guarantee that after taking this course you'll be completely comfortable with installing WordPress, adding new content, customising themes, and managing existing blogs or websites.

For many people just getting started is the hardest part, so I have provided a complete series of WordPress tutorials for beginners with videos and easy to follow step-by-step guides. You can watch the videos and use this guide freely, the purpose of the content is to be helpful and show you how to get started building your own website.

So follow along to join the thousands of people around the world who have successfully made their own websites using the power of WordPress.

WHAT YOU WILL BE LEARNING:

  • How to Install WordPress in less than 5 minutes.
  • How to Design your website and give it a professional look.
  • Advanced tips for making your site a success and avoiding common problems.
title: Wordpress Training Course for Beginners
